cards.rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you're horrific, you draw a card and you lose life equal to the number of cards in your hand. (You're horrific as long as you've sacrificed a permanent or discarded a card this turn.)

cards.rules_text:
Create an 8/8 blue Kraken creature token with hexproof.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Aspiring Hero attacks alone, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
When Aspiring Hero dies, each opponent gains life equal to its power.

[i]John was ecstatic to see someone heroic in these godforsaken tapes. At least, until he saw what happened to her.

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text: Damage can't be prevented this turn. Beat & Batter deals 2 damage to target player, then 2 damage to each player that's gained life this turn.
